author: SciShow
description:
JMP offers a 30-day free trial for anyone, anywhere. Go to https://www.jmp.com/scishow to see the benefits of visual statistics for yourself. 

A huge number of vehicular fatalities are people who aren't in cars at all. Pedestrians are dying more than they used to and more in America than other comparable parts of the world. Here's why.

Hosted by: Savannah Geary (they/them)

title: Why Do So Many More Pedestrians Die in America?
